data.name: Ancestor's Fury
data.description: The memory of your ancestors bolsters your resolve, grainting you a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength and increased chance to critically hit by 10% for 10 seconds. Your Oath Friend is affected as well if they're within 50 feet of you.

data.name: Ancestral Inheritance
data.description: Gain a 660 unique bonus to armor.

data.name: Avalanche
data.description: When you disrupt an enemy's spell, your run speed will be increased by 30% for 5 seconds and you will recover X health.

data.name: Avenging the Debt
data.description: A decisive final strike that deals X physical damage to your enemy. You will regain Y health, and your Oath Friend will be affected as well if they're within 50 feet of you.

data.name: Away With Ye
data.description: A dismissive strike that deals X physical damage and knocks the enemy away.

data.name: Axe Slam
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all enemies in front of you, up to 65 feet away.

data.name: Axe Toss
data.description: A basic throwing attack that inflicts X physical damage. Has a chance to deal Y physical damage to a severely wounded target if you are behind them.

data.name: Binding Grudge
data.description:
You chop at your enemy's legs, causing them to take X physical damage over 10 seconds and snaring them, reducing their run speed by 40%.

With 25 Grudges: Damages for A physical damage over 10 seconds.
With 50 Grudges: Damages for B physical damage over 10 seconds.
With 75 Grudges: Damages for C physical damage over 10 seconds.
With 100 Grudges: Damages for D physical damage over 10 seconds.

data.name: Cave-In
data.description:
You smash into your enemy, knocking them down for 3seconds.

At 25 Grudges: Deals W physical damage over 3 seconds.
At 50 Grudges: Deals X physical damage over 3 seconds.
At 75 Grudges: Deals Y physical damage over 3 seconds.
At 100 Grudges: Deals Z physical damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Challenge
data.description: You challenge all opponents in front of you, forcing monsters to attack you. While challenged, your opponents will deal only 70% damage to everyone other than you. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Champion's Challenge
data.description:
Both you and your target are held tightly in place for 10 seconds, and neither one of you can move.
This effect can not be dispelled or broken.

data.name: Demolishing Strike
data.description: A powerful melee attack that reduces your target's armor by 1056 and deals 900 damage over 15 seconds

data.name: Distracting Bellow
data.description: A loud shout that startles your target and all enemies within 30 feet of them, reducing their damage to 50% for 10 seconds.

data.name: Dwarven Riposte
data.description: Whenever you parry you also build 30 Grudge. This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Earthen Renewal
data.description: Group members within 100 feet regain 798 health and 240 action points over 9 seconds.

data.name: Earthshatter
data.description:
The ground around you cracks and shatters and snares all enemies within 30 feet, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.

At 25 Grudge: Deals W physical damage to each enemy hit by the effect.
At 50 Grudge: Deals X physical damage to each enemy hit by the effect.
At 75 Grudge: Deals Y physical damage to each enemy hit by the effect.
At 100 Grudge: Deals Z physical damage to each enemy hit by the effect.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30% for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Offense
data.description: Taunt will now apply 10 stacks to the target.

data.name: Greataxe Mastery
data.description: When you are wielding a greatweapon, your chance to parry is increased by 5% and all damage you deal is increased by 10%.

data.name: Grip of Stone
data.description: You shatter the ground for 30 feet around you, rooting up to four enemies in place for 5 seconds. There is a 50% chance of the root breaking with every hit.

data.name: Gromril Plating
data.description: You become protected by a barrier which will absorb up to 7200 damage for 20 seconds.

data.name: Grudge Unleashed
data.description: You focus on your Grudges to ready yourself for action, restoring 160 AP.

data.name: Grudge-Born Fury
data.description:
You constantly pummel your target with brutal attacks, dealing up to X physical damage over 3 seconds. Your attacks will end if you lose your concentration.

At 25 Grudge: Chance to critically hit is increased by 5%.
At 50 Grudge: Chance to critically hit is increased by 10%.
At 75 Grudge: Chance to critically hit is increased by 15%.
At 100 Grudge: Chance to critically hit is increased by 20%.

data.name: Grudging Blow
data.description: A vicious attack that deals X physical damage, and causes monsters to hate you much more than normal.

data.name: Grumble An' Mutter
data.description: You begin to constantly complain about everything that's wrong today, telling everyone how much better things were back in the old days. You feel much better for the chance to grumble, and your groupmates within 100 feet restore X health every 3 seconds for up to 30 seconds. You lose 10 Grudge each time this happens, and the effect will end if you run out of Grudges.

data.name: Guard
data.description:
You defend one of your groupmates and try to take attacks meant for them. As long as you are within 30 feet of them, any damage that they suffer will be split evenly between the two of you, and 35% of all hate that they cause will be redirected to you.

Damage received from this ability can be blocked or parried, unless the original attack was undefendable.

data.name: Guarded Attack
data.description:
You deal X physical damage to your target and prepare yourself for their attacks, gaining a X ability bonus to armor and a (Rank * 3) ability bonus to toughness for 20 seconds.
Your Oath Friend's stats will also be increased if they are within 50 feet.

data.name: Heavy Blow
data.description:
You strike a crushing blow for X physical damage.

With 25 Grudges: Deals A physical damage over 3 seconds.
With 50 Grudges: Deals B physical damage over 3 seconds.
With 75 Grudges: Deals C physical damage over 3 seconds.
With 100 Grudges: Deals D physical damage over 3 seconds.

data.name: Hold The Line!
data.description:
You focus your defenses against enemy fire, increasing your chances to dodge and disrupt by 45% for 12 seconds. You will also defend all allies behind you, up to 50 feet away, increasing their chances to dodge and disrupt by 15% as long as they remain at your back. Allies may have this effect stacked on them up to 3 times.
This effect will end if you break your concentration, or run out of action points.

data.name: Immaculate Defense
data.description: An impressive display of defense which reduces incoming damage by 75% for both you and all group members within 100 feet of you for 10 seconds.

data.name: Inspiring Attack
data.description:
A brutal attack that deals X physical damage to your target and inspires you to push the attack, gaining a (3 * rank) ability bonus to strength for 20 seconds. Will also affect your Oath Friend if they are within 50 feet.

At 25 Grudges: Also grants a A ability bonus to willpower.
At 50 Grudges: Also grants a B ability bonus to willpower.
At 75 Grudges: Also grants a C ability bonus to willpower.
At 100 Grudges: Also grants a D ability bonus to willpower.

data.name: Juggernaut
data.description: You become filled with unstoppable power, removing all snaring, rooting, silencing, and disarming effects.

data.name: Kneecapper
data.description:
A painful strike to the enemy's leg that deals X physical damage. With Grudges, reduces enemy critcal hit chance for 10 seconds.

At 25 Grudges: Also reduces the target's chance to critically hit by 5%.
At 50 Grudges: Also reduces the target's chance to critically hit by 10%.
At 75 Grudges: Also reduces the target's chance to critically hit by 15%.
At 100 Grudges: Also reduces the target's chance to critically hit by 20%.

data.name: Lingering Grudge
data.description: Each time you hit an enemy with Rune-Etched Axe, Vengeful Strike, or Grudge Born Fury they will take an additional X physical damage over 5 seconds. This effect can stack 5 times.

data.name: Long Reach
data.description: Extends the reach of Shield Sweep and Rune-Etched Axe by an additional 5 feet. (needs rework)

data.name: Long-Held Grudge
data.description:
(Disabled)All of your damaging attacks will cause additional hate based on Grudge.
At 25 Grudges: Adds an additional 15 threat.
At 50 Grudges: Adds an additional 20 threat.
At 75 Grudges: Adds an additional 25 threat.
At 100 Grudges: Adds an additional 30 threat. (needs rework)

data.name: Menace
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 100% more than normal on all attacks.

data.name: Oath Friend
data.description:
You select a single ally to be your sworn Oath Friend. Each time they are attacked, you will gain Grudges based on your current Grudge level, and some of your abilities will affect them as well.
You are at 0-29 Grudge: You will gain 10 Grudges.
You are at 30-59 Grudge: You will gain 5 Grudges.
You are at 60-100 Grudge: You will gain 3 Grudge.

data.name: Oathbound
data.description: Strengthens the ties between you and your Oath Friend, gaining a (2 * rank) ability bonus to initiative and chance to parry by 25% for 10 seconds. Your Oath Friend is affected as well if they're within 50 feet of you.

data.name: Oathstone
data.description:
All enemies within 30 feet are affected by Stonebreaker. You are almost guaranteed to block up to the next 10 attacks made against you within 10 seconds, and you will deal X physical damage back to the attacker each time you block.

With 25 Grudges: Deals A physical damage back to the attacker.
With 50 Grudges: Deals B physical damage back to the attacker.
With 75 Grudges: Deals C physical damage back to the attacker.
With 100 Grudges: Deals D physical damage back to the attacker.

data.name: Overprotective
data.description: Whenever your Oath Friend is attacked there is a 25% chance that you toss the assailant a glare so fierce they take X physical damage. (rework some?)

data.name: Punishing Blow
data.description: You maim your target's legs, dealing X physical damage causing them to suffer Y physical damage for every half second they are moving.

data.name: Punishing Knock
data.description: Inspiring Attack will also curse your target, reducing the value of their outgoing healing by 50% for 20 seconds.

data.name: Raze
data.description: Repeatedly attack all enemies in a line in front of you, inflicting 300 damage every second for 3 seconds, up to 65 feet away, for as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: Relentless Training
data.description: Grudging Blow and Heavy Blow will cost 15 fewer action points. (needs reworked)

data.name: Rising Anger
data.description: Each time you hit an enemy, you gain 5 Grudge. This effect will not trigger more than once per second.

data.name: Rock Clutch
data.description: Deals 600 damage to your target and roots them in place for 10 seconds.

data.name: Rugged
data.description: Gain a 160 unique bonus to toughness.

data.name: Rune-Etched Axe
data.description:
You whirl your axe around, dealing X physical damage to enemies 25 feet in front of you.

At 25 Grudges: Ignores 25% of the victim's armor.
At 50 Grudges: Ignores 50% of the victim's armor.
At 75 Grudges: Ignores 75% of the victim's armor.
At 100 Grudges: Ignores 100% of the victim's armor.

data.name: Runic Shield
data.description: You invoke a powerful rune that you've learned, and become surrounded by a protective barrier for 10 seconds which will absorb up to X magical damage. Your Oath Friend will be affected as well if they're within 50 feet of you. During this time, you will gain 15 Grudges each time you're hit by an enemy spell.

data.name: Seasoned Veteran
data.description: Whenever you block an attack you will take only 85% damage for 5 seconds.

data.name: Seen It All Before
data.description: Snares last half duration against you and when you are critically hit by an enemy, the bonus damage that you suffer is reduced by 15%.

data.name: Sever Blessing
data.description: You sever one blessing from your enemy and do X physical damage.

data.name: Shield Mastery
data.description: Increases your chance to block attacks by 10%, the grudge cost of Shield Sweep is reduced by 10, and Shield of Reprisal no longer requires a block or parry in order to activate.

data.name: Shield of Reprisal
data.description: A furious counterattack that deals X physical damage and will knock your target down for 3 seconds.

data.name: Shield Sweep
data.description: You bring your shield around in a smashing hit, dealing X physical damage to up to enemies within 25 feet of them.

data.name: Shield Wall
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, your chance to block is almost guaranteed.

data.name: Skin of Iron
data.description: All damage you take is reduced to 1 for 5 seconds.

data.name: Stone Breaker
data.description:
A powerful attack that smashes through your enemy's protections, dealing X physical damage and causing them to take an ability penalty to armor based on Grudges for 20 seconds.

At 25 Grudges: Reduces armor by 156.
At 50 Grudges: Reduces armor by 312.
At 75 Grudges: Reduces armor by 468.
At 100 Grudges: Reduces armor by 625.

data.name: Stoutness of Stone
data.description: You recover from stuns and knockdowns 50% quicker. You will still gain immunity based on the original duration.

data.name: Strength In Numbers
data.description: Increases your chance to block attacks by 100% for 10 seconds, and increases chances to dodge, parry, and disrupt attacks by 25% to all group members within 100 feet.

data.name: Stubborn As Stone
data.description:
You set your mind to the task at hand and focus on what must be done, gaining a X ability bonus to corporeal resistance for 20 seconds. Each time you're hit by magical damage while this effect is active, your autoattack speed will be increased by 50% for 20 seconds.
Also increases your Oath Friend's resistance if they are within 50 feet.

data.name: Stubbornness
data.description: Grants a 300 unique bonus to corporeal resistance. Gain a 169 unique bonus to elemental and spiritual resistance.

data.name: Subtlety
data.description: Enemy monsters will hate you 25% less than normal.

data.name: Sweet Revenge
data.description: Increases your chance to critically hit by 15% if you are above 50 Grudge.

data.name: Taunt
data.description: You enrage your opponent, interrupting any currently building abilities and forcing monsters to attack you. While taunted your opponent will take 30% more damage from your attacks. This effect will fade after 15 seconds or after your opponent has hit you 3 times.

data.name: Told Ya So!
data.description: Each time you use Avenging the Debt, each group member within 100 feet will gain 25 action points. Watch An' Learn will now grant 25 action points instead of 10.

data.name: Unstoppable Juggernaut
data.description: Juggernaut's cooldown is reduced to 20 seconds.

data.name: Vengeful Strike
data.description: You strike your enemy for X physical damage. Your Oath Friend will deal additional physical damage with their next attack if they are within 30 feet.

data.name: Watch An' Learn
data.description: Grants you a (3 * rank) ability bonus to weapon skill for 10 seconds. Each time you strike an enemy, your Oath Friend will gain 10 action points if they are within 50 feet of you.
